title: Did the deceased have any other children
question: Did {deceasedName} have any other children?
paragraph1: We need to know about all children {deceasedName} had, including any children who:
listItem1: were legally adopted or given up for adoption
listItem2: have died, either before or after {deceasedName}
paragraph2: This does not include any step-children.

anyOtherChildren.required: Select ‘Yes’ if {deceasedName} had any other children
